translation.your_plan_is_ready: I prepare a plan for you!

firstDataScreen.title: Welcome to the Nelaton Smart Assistant
firstDataScreen.description: Please answer a few simple questions so I can set up a catheterization plan.

translation.secondDataScreen_description: Measuring fluid intake and urine output helps maintain optimal hydration levels in the body.

thirdDataScreen.title: Your Self-Catheterization Plan:
thirdDataScreen.description: This plan will be adapted to you. After each self-catheterization, the time until the next one will be calculated, and notifications will be activated. Always catheterize until the end of the interval.
thirdDataScreen.notification_Description: You will receive notifications to catheterize on time!
thirdDataScreen.notice: The optimal frequency of catheterizations is 4-6 times a day. If more than 400ml of urine is released per catheterization, it is recommended to increase the frequency of catheterizations. Adhere to the catheterization interval prescribed by your doctor.

know_from_doctor.title: Consult your doctor about:
know_from_doctor.the_possibility_of_not_catheterizing_at_: the possibility of not catheterizing at night
know_from_doctor.how_much_water_you_need_to_drink: how much water you need to drink

translation.dont_want_to_fill_out: I don't want to fill out

componentSleepTimeStartEnd.title: Indicate your usual sleep time:
componentSleepTimeStartEnd.night_mode_description: If you do not plan to catheterize at night, activate Night Mode during evening catheterization or by using the "Night Mode"

waterBalanceComponent.title: Water Balance
waterBalanceComponent.description: Normal diuresis is 75-80% of the amount of fluid intake.

intervals.negative_text: (<75%): This range indicates that the volume of urination is less than 75% of the volume of fluid intake.
intervals.normal_text: (75-80%): This is the optimal ratio where the urine volume is 75-80% of the volume of fluid intake. This indicates a healthy water balance.
intervals.positive_text: (80-100%): This range indicates that the urine volume is 80-100% of the volume of fluid intake. Increased diuresis, the body excretes more fluid than usual.

clueAtTheBottom.title: You can always change this selection in the tab.

catheterizationReminder.firstPartTitle: We will remind you to catheterize
catheterizationReminder.secondPartTitle: minutes before the end of the interval. You can change these and other settings below.

noticeOfCatheterizationComponent.title: Catheterization Notifications:
noticeOfCatheterizationComponent.notice: After the evening catheterization, we will calculate the time for the night catheterization and set the alarm.

noticeOfWaterConsumptionComponents.title: Fluid Intake Notifications:
noticeOfWaterConsumptionComponents.remind_to_reached_water_goal_time: Remind throughout the day until the goal is reached:

noticeOfRemainCaths.title: Catheter Stock Notifications:
noticeOfRemainCaths.when_the_stock_is_less_then: When the stock is less than
noticeOfRemainCaths.how_many_caths: How many catheters do you have?

modalEditCatheters.how_many_catheters_do_you_have: How many catheters do you have?

waterBalanceScreen.waterBalanceInfo: Water balance is the ratio between the amount of fluid entering the body and the amount of fluid leaving the body over a specific period of time. Measuring your fluid intake and urine output will help you maintain optimal hydration levels in your body.

intervals.normal: n o r m a l     i n t e r v a l
intervals.critical: c r i t i c a l   i n t e r v a l

journalScreen.title: Journal Screen:
journalScreen.no_records_for_the_selected_day: No records for the selected day

questionnaireScreen.question_one: How often do you experience pain or discomfort during catheterization?
questionnaireScreen.question_two: Have there been any cases of bleeding after catheterization?
questionnaireScreen.question_three: Have you experienced signs of infection after catheterization, such as fever, frequent urination, pain, or burning?
questionnaireScreen.question_four: Have you had any allergic reactions or skin irritation caused by the catheter or lubricants?
questionnaireScreen.question_five: How would you rate the ease of use of the catheter and lubricants?
questionnaireScreen.question_six: Did you experience any difficulties with catheterization due to insufficient training on the procedure?
questionnaireScreen.question_seven: Were there any instances where catheterization failed, requiring urgent medical attention?
questionnaireScreen.question_eight: Did you encounter any difficulties inserting the catheter? If yes, please describe the difficulties encountered.
questionnaireScreen.question_nine: What additional problems or complications related to catheterization would you like to mention?

catheterNoticeComponent.when_the_stock_is_less_than: When the stock is less than

nightModeScreen.title: Night Mode Catheterization Settings

askActivateAfterTimeComponent.askToActivate: Ask to activate Night Mode after catheterization after

notificationsAtNightComponent.description_first_part: From the time of catheterization before sleep and activation of
notificationsAtNightComponent.description_second_part: until morning, notifications will not be sent.

nightModeScreen.morningCathNoticeDescription: Would you like to receive morning notifications to remind you to catheterize?

timeOfNoticeComponent.specify_the_time: Specify the time you would like to receive the notification.

reducingFluidIntakeComponent.receive_notifications_to_reduce_fluid_in: Would you like to receive notifications to reduce fluid intake:

nightModeScreen.notice: Discuss the catheterization frequency and the possibility of excluding it at night with your doctor.

personalizationScreen.title: Personalize Your Urination Diary
personalizationScreen.description: This data will be reflected in the PDF version of your urination diary. The filled information will help the doctor recognize your document and use it to monitor your health and adjust treatment if necessary.
personalizationScreen.which_catheter_do_you_use: Which catheter do you use? Model Name/Manufacturer
personalizationScreen.which_catheter_do_you_use_hint: You can find this information on the catheter packaging you use
personalizationScreen.additional_information: Here you can leave additional information for the doctor (diagnoses, types of injuries, medication intake)
personalizationScreen.volume_info: "general" norms: Women - 250-500 ml, Men - 350-700 ml, Children - 35-400 ml (depending on age)

modalDocumentCreation.title: Document Creation
modalDocumentCreation.complete_and_include_PDF_questionnaire: Complete and include the PDF Catheterization Satisfaction Questionnaire

modalFluidIntake.how_much_fluid_did_you_drink: How much fluid did you drink?

modalUrineOutput.continue_without_recording_the_urine_vol: Continue without recording the urine volume

noticeWhenPressClose.title: Please indicate the amount of released urine.
noticeWhenPressClose.description: If you don't want to constantly input the value, you can change this in the "Profile" screen.

translation.press_one_more_time: Press one more time to exit
